name: Harry Obby
summary: Harry Potter fan game with obstacle courses. It is a sandbox game and you can explore anywhere at Hogwarts. There are four houses for the player to select. The objective of the player is to collect all of the Famous Witches and Wizards Cards from the game.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: Longplay of Harry Obby 0.9.0  | No Deaths | Chapter 1-10 + Unlocking Lord Voldemort
